Spawns a {{Class|FireDemonMissile}} and on success, plays the sound "FireDemonAttack" on..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Classic attack}} '''A_FiredAttack'''
(''no parameter'')
Spawns a {{Class|FireDemonMissile}} and on success, plays the sound "FireDemonAttack" on the Body channel. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FireDemon}} and derived classes.
